channel.title: HP Bar glitch
channel.description:
[size=20pt]BEFORE READING:[/size] [size=15pt]Please just watch the video if you want to see what it is, explanation is a bit confusing.[/size] [size=20pt]BEFORE READING:[/size]
Hi everyone,
My problem is, the HP bar is glitchy in the game, and when you hit NPC/player, and the HP it turns gray half way, then when he's not dead, it's all gray (Supposedly dead) one to five hits, he's dead. This will confuse players in wild.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T57BYmggjVc[/youtube]
Hope someone knows a fix...Thanks!
Side-Note: If anyone knows how to fix magic (Barrage) Also, please tell me. It doesn't hit, it just wastes spell, I think this has to do with the Hp..
I just found out, when you use any spell on NPC, and then do melee, it won't hit until you relog.
Credits: TrisidiaX

item.title: HP Bar glitch
item.dc:creator: @RebirthScape RebirthScape
item.description:
@RebirthScape wrote:

try wearing mage gear?

I did, Ahrim…ETC. Nothing. I don’t know why…Still googling answers…

Read full topic

item.title: HP Bar glitch
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

[quote=“RebirthScape, post:5, topic:450627”][quote author=TrisidiaX link=topic=553499.msg4055460#msg4055460 date=1342897904]

Well scence this is my server! of cource i can help u fix it! now the problem is some sprites are missing… here is what u can do
In cachedownloader.java look for private String cacheLink = you sshould see a link replace that link with this one
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/My%20Rar%20Files/TrisidiaX_Cache.zip
now compile and go into your sprite folder. the org sprite folder should be “TrisidiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.4” if u canged it then locate the sprite folder delete the whole folder! then run the client and the cache should autodownload with that sprite in it! then there the hp bar should be working 100%

[size=12pt]Awesome job! All I did was try to change link in cache, got error…But, I figured, why not just put sprites in the same folder? It works now, thank you! Also, good job. :)[/size]

Thank you very much, sir. And yes, great job on server. I’m trying to finish up your Squeal of fortune, so far, so bad. :#

If I could rep, I would.

But, vouch to you.

Side-note: Testing this out.

what do u mean u get an error?
[/quote]

For cache, just that cache error where it says delete history, fixed it.

But, just the magic is the part that has the error…

error.png1022×241

I don’t know if it explains enough, but you use ice barrage, you have to relog in order to hit NPCS.

The barrage makes no damage + errors.[/quote]
try wearing mage gear?

Read full topic

now compile and go into your sprite folder. the org sprite folder should be “TrisidiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.4” if u canged it then locate the sprite folder delete the whole folder! then run the client and the cache should autodownload with that sprite in it! then there the hp bar should be working 100%

If I could rep, I would.

But, vouch to you.

[/quote]
what do u mean u get an error?[/quote]

I don’t know if it explains enough, but you use ice barrage, you have to relog in order to hit NPCS.

The barrage makes no damage + errors.

[size=15pt]Please just watch the video if you want to see what it is, explanation is a bit confusing.[/size]
[size=20pt]BEFORE READING:[/size]

Hi everyone,

My problem is, the HP bar is glitchy in the game, and when you hit NPC/player, and the HP it turns gray half way, then when he’s not dead, it’s all gray (Supposedly dead) one to five hits, he’s dead. This will confuse players in wild.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T57BYmggjVc[/youtube]

Hope someone knows a fix…Thanks!

Side-Note: If anyone knows how to fix magic (Barrage) Also, please tell me. It doesn’t hit, it just wastes spell, I think this has to do with the Hp…

I just found out, when you use any spell on NPC, and then do melee, it won’t hit until you relog.[/quote]
Well scence this is my server! of cource i can help u fix it! now the problem is some sprites are missing… here is what u can do
In cachedownloader.java look for private String cacheLink = you sshould see a link replace that link with this one
https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/My%20Rar%20Files/TrisidiaX_Cache.zip
now compile and go into your sprite folder. the org sprite folder should be “TrisidiaX_Cache_Webclient_V1.4” if u canged it then locate the sprite folder delete the whole folder! then run the client and the cache should autodownload with that sprite in it! then there the hp bar should be working 100%
